Description.Details: Based on the C3 system, the Improved C3 Computer (or C3i) reproduces the functions of a C3 Master Computer into a smaller and lighter system. By sharing targeting data lance mates gain an increase to the distance a weapon is considered in optimal range. The C3i optimal range increase is 2/3 the increase the original C3 versions gave.

Description.Name: C3I NETWORK RANGE BUFF
Description.Details: Friendly units within a C3 Network gain [AMT] increase in optimal weapon range.
